EmailTemplate.name: HEVT-202307-xSEG-FRM-FORUM-REGISTRATION.Invite #3 USGH + HHS Registrants (Recogn
EmailTemplate.subject: Recognize the best of the best at Forum 2023
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
July 18 – 19, 2023 | Boston, MA Make your mark Find, connect with, and celebrate your people at Forum. We are thrilled to welcome more leaders to the stage and open the Forum Awards—a one-of-a-kind opportunity to honor those whose efforts to advance virtual care go above and beyond. Forum Awards The Forum community is passionate about recognizing great work. Nominate <[[https://airtable.com/shrSnqlcaNHddteS8]]> deserving people and organizations for their contributions to the future of healthcare, then join us in Boston to celebrate their achievements.
Nominations will be accepted through Friday, June 9, 2023. About Teladoc Health: Teladoc Health is transforming the healthcare experience and empowering people everywhere to live healthier lives. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages more than a decade of expertise and data-driven insights to meet the growing virtual care needs of consumers and healthcare professionals. All rights reserved. 2 Manhattanville Road, Purchase NY, 10577.
